user.title: Tesla Sync Setup
user.description: Configure Tesla Sync to automatically sync electricity pricing to your Tesla Powerwall.

provider_selection.title: Select Electricity Provider
provider_selection.description:
Choose your electricity provider:

**Amber Electric**: Full real-time price sync using Amber API.

**Flow Power**: Wholesale electricity with Happy Hour exports. Choose AEMO or Amber pricing.

**Globird/VPP**: AEMO spike detection for VPP exports.

flow_power_setup.title: Flow Power Configuration
flow_power_setup.description:
Configure your Flow Power settings.

Select your network tariff from the dropdown. This is automatically calculated using the aemo_to_tariff library.

Check 'Use manual rates' if you prefer to enter rates manually.

data.network_use_manual_rates: Use manual rates instead of automatic lookup

amber.title: Amber Electric Configuration
amber.description: Enter your Amber Electric API token. You can get this from {amber_url}

aemo_config.title: AEMO Spike Detection
aemo_config.description:
Configure AEMO wholesale price spike detection. When prices spike above your threshold, the Powerwall will be configured to export energy to the grid.

{threshold_hint}

tesla_provider.title: Choose Tesla API Provider
tesla_provider.description:
{fleet_detected}

Select how you want to access your Tesla Powerwall. Tesla Fleet API is free but requires the Tesla Fleet integration to be installed. Teslemetry is a paid proxy service (~$4/month) that's easier to set up.

teslemetry.title: Teslemetry Configuration
teslemetry.description: Enter your Teslemetry API token. You can get this from {teslemetry_url}

site_selection.title: Site Selection
site_selection.description: Select your Tesla energy site and Amber site (if you have multiple), and configure auto-sync.

demand_charges.title: Demand Charge Configuration (Optional)
demand_charges.description: Configure demand charge tracking for electricity plans with capacity-based fees. Demand charges are applied during peak periods based on your maximum power draw. Leave 'Enable Demand Charge Tracking' unchecked to skip this step.

flow_power_options.title: Flow Power Options
flow_power_options.description:
Configure Flow Power wholesale electricity with Happy Hour export rates (5:30pm-7:30pm: 45c NSW/QLD/SA, 35c VIC).

Select your network tariff from the dropdown. Check 'Use manual rates' to enter rates manually.
